sentences.en: ...the quiet competence with which he discharged his many duties.
sentences.cn: …他履行他的诸多职责所用的平静的办事能力。

sentences.en: a purulent discharge from the wound
sentences.cn: 从伤口中流出的脓

sentences.en: After his discharge from the school, he went to Hong Kong.
sentences.cn: 他离开学校后去了香港.

sentences.en: Franklin's experiments showed that the lightning is an electrical discharge.
sentences.cn: 富兰克林的实验表明闪电是一种放电.

sentences.en: He was given a conditional discharge and ordered to pay Miss Smith $500 compensation.
sentences.cn: 他被判有条件释放，并被命令向史密斯小姐支付$500的赔偿金。

sentences.en: Hospitals now tend to discharge patients earlier than in the past.
sentences.cn: 与过去相比，现在医院更趋向于让病人早些出院。

sentences.en: In industry, a worker who is grossly insubordinate is threatened with discharge.
sentences.cn: 在企业内部，拒不服从指令的工人会面临遭解雇的威胁。

sentences.en: Sam has been kicking around Europe since his discharge from the army.
sentences.cn: 萨姆从部队退役以来一直在欧洲到处游荡.

sentences.en: Section 404 requires permits for the discharge of dredged or fill material.
sentences.cn: 第404条要求对排放那些疏浚和填充材料予以限制.

sentences.en: Sewage is discharged directly into the sea.
sentences.cn: 污水被直接排放到海里。

sentences.en: Since 1979 China has collected 24.7 billion yuan in pollutant discharge fees.
sentences.cn: 1979年以来,全国共征收排污费247亿元.

sentences.en: Some factories in this locality still discharge waste water into the river.
sentences.cn: 这一地区有些工厂仍把废水排入河中.

sentences.en: the discharge of toxic waste into the sea
sentences.cn: 有毒废物向海里的排放

sentences.en: The judge discharged the jury.
sentences.cn: 法官解散了陪审团。

sentences.en: The sewers discharge out at sea.
sentences.cn: 下水道的污水排入海里.

sentences.en: The water pipes discharge freely.
sentences.cn: 水管畅流.

sentences.en: The wound hasn't healed, there's still some discharge.
sentences.cn: 伤口没好, 还有些浓液.

sentences.en: There was a watery discharge from her ear.
sentences.cn: 她耳朵里流出水样分泌物。

sentences.en: They develop a fever and a watery discharge from their eyes.
sentences.cn: 他们开始发烧，眼睛里分泌出一种水状物。

sentences.en: We have to discharge our duties.
sentences.cn: 我们必须尽责.

sentences.en: We have to discharge ourselves of our duties.
sentences.cn: 我们必须尽我们的职责.

phrases.tran_cn: 放电过程；放电作用；排出过程
电火花加工；[电]放电机械制作
局部放电；部分放电；部份履行

trans.tran_cn: 排出物，获准离开，免职，出院，退伍，履行，清偿
trans.tran_en: when gas, liquid, smoke etc is sent out, or the substance that is sent out

trans.tran_cn: 允许…离开，解雇，释放，排出，履行，清偿（债务），开枪
trans.tran_en: to send out gas, liquid, smoke etc, or to allow it to escape

trans.tran_cn: 排放； 释放； 解雇
trans.tran_en: to send out gas, liquid, smoke etc, or to allow it to escape

trans.tran_cn: 发射； 排出， 流出； 放
trans.tran_en: to send out gas, liquid, smoke etc, or to allow it to escape

trans.tran_cn: 卸货；释放； 遣散， 解雇； 解除 <
